contents.text:
Sheikah Slate Manual
Written by: Purah!

Cute Stamps


Stamps are simply a mark that you can
place on your map. They are incredibly
easy to use and cute to boot!
First, open the map on your
Sheikah Slate.

Look around it, and if you find a spot
you're curious about, you can place a
stamp there with the press of a button.
You can also use

instead of stamps
if you want to create an actual beam of
light at that spot to show you the way.
It's all super handy!

Stasis Stuff


Not only does Stasis stop objects from
moving...it also

!
So if you freeze an object with this rune,
try hitting it while it's frozen.

Then, when the Stasis effect has ended...
Heh, you'll see!

Crazy for Cryonis


Cryonis isn't only for making ice pillars
you can climb on...

You can also use it to

!

If you hear a Guardian go BEEP BEEP,
quickly make some ice to hide behind.
It's just common sense!
